title: It's Worth The Wait | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: It's Worth The Wait | Joel Osteen
description:
When we're in a waiting season, it’s easy to feel discouraged and impatient. But God is using the delay to prepare you for His favor. You can stay in faith, knowing that at the right time, He will deliver you to your breakthrough.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
